about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a Frontend developer based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas to real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a web developer position.
about.cta: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
about.location: Where are you located? Are you open to different ways of working, such as working remotely or even relocating?
about.lightbulb: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
about.puzzle: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: I have gained experience in the following areas during my projects.
skills.question: Looking for
skills.description: Reveal enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

wraith.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Wraith to find the way to the next level and defeat the boss.

pokédex.description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Got a problem to solve?
contact.description: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
contact.cta: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!

form.name: Your name
form.privacy: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

quotes.quote: Manuel really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
quotes.author: V. Schuster
quotes.title: Team Partner

quotes.quote: Manuel's technical skills and problem-solving approach are outstanding. He always finds creative solutions and delivers high-quality work.
quotes.author: A. Müller
quotes.title: Project Manager

quotes.quote: Working with Manuel was a pleasure. His attention to detail and dedication to excellence made our project a huge success.
quotes.author: S. Weber
quotes.title: Lead Developer
